name: Magical Birthday Cupcake Maker
description:
Create your own unique and magnificent magical birthday cupcake collecting magical toppings scattered across Kitchenland before the birthday is here!

After creating your cupcake, you'll be able to save a screenshot picture of your custom cupcake. It works great for a unique birthday card!

Tip: Choose your decorations tastefully! You don't need to use all the toppings.

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys or WASD Keys
Jump: Spacebar
Go to Birthday early: Escape
Toggle FPS Meter: F key
Save a Screenshot to Desktop Folder: P key (for picture!)

Known Bug: Taking a screenshot either at the end or through the P key will make the mouse cursor invisible in the game, but you can still click buttons. Not sure how to fix this.

Made in <1 week for #JupiBDayJam and #MVJam17.

Tools: Unity, Blender, Substance Painter, Gimp

Music: Animal Dreams 2 by Julie Buchanan
